original_title: Neil Young + The Promise of the Real: Noise & Flowers
overview: In 2019, just two weeks after the passing of his life-time friend, Elliot Roberts, his manager for over 50 years. Promise of the Real and Neil Young made a wonderous tour through Europe. Playing in his memory. One of the most special tours ever. They hit the road and took Elliot’s great spirit with them into every song. This music belongs to no one. It’s in the air. Every note was played for music’s great friend Elliot.
tagline: This music belongs to no one. It’s in the air.
title: Neil Young + The Promise of the Real: Noise & Flowers
